snippet.textDisplay: For what it's worth I got the 3DS version, don't think I remember ever seeing the DS version. Definitely a hidden Gem!  Atlus knows how to make demos ( Lets you play the first couple chapters of the game (Prologue + Chapter 1). If the story is engaging people will buy it to see the rest of the 30-40 hour story :).
snippet.textOriginal: For what it's worth I got the 3DS version, don't think I remember ever seeing the DS version. Definitely a hidden Gem! snippet.textDisplay:
For those wondering about the reprint, the price of this game has drastically reduced over the past couple of months, so I can assume that there was indeed a reprint at some point.
If you have the cash, go out and find this game, people aren't kidding when they call it the best RPG on the DS.

For those wondering about the reprint, the price of this game has drastically reduced over the past couple of months, so I can assume that there was indeed a reprint at some point.

snippet.textDisplay: @SupraDarky  If you do get a chance to play it you will not be disappointed, Great Soundtrack, Fun Battle Mechanics, and a pretty solid story.

snippet.textDisplay:
I bought this game the minute I saw it at Gamestop like...a week after it first dropped.  And now all I hear about is that it's so hard to find.

You know what I say?  Wait it out, you might just find that reprint.  I would have been shit out of luck if that reprint of Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney 1 never happened.  I never would have experienced my favorite game series ever.  Or took gaming seriously afterwards.

Same with one of my favorite RPGs ever...Radiant Historia.
snippet.textOriginal:
I bought this game the minute I saw it at Gamestop like...a week after it first dropped.  And now all I hear about is that it's so hard to find.

You know what I say?  Wait it out, you might just find that reprint.  I would have been shit out of luck if that reprint of Phoenix Wright Ace Attorney 1 never happened.  I never would have experienced my favorite game series ever.  Or took gaming seriously afterwards.

Same with one of my favorite RPGs ever...Radiant Historia.

snippet.textDisplay:
SupraDarky, I've been following your list for the longest of time (though not from the beginning, I'm almost ashamed to admit), and every time you upload a new song, I'm eager to see which you pick.
As a huge fan of Radiant Historia and Yoko Shimomura, I'm happy to see you've added this track!

snippet.textDisplay: I should have bought this game before it got impossible to find. Thankfully, Atlus might release more copies soon since they asked their fans if they'd be interested in a reprint. Great soundtrack by Shimomura. Some people say this is the best RPG on the DS so I'm very much looking forward to it.

Thankfully, Atlus might release more copies soon since they asked their fans if they'd be interested in a reprint. Great soundtrack by Shimomura. Some people say this is the best RPG on the DS so I'm very much looking forward to it.
